text: int main ( ) { int n , i , t , j , k , tmp ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; int a [ n ] [ n ] ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; for ( j = 0 ; j < t ; j ++ ) { for ( k = 0 ; k < j + 1 ; k ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ j ] [ k ] ) ; } } for ( j = n - 1 ; j >= 0 ; j -- ) { for ( k = 0 ; k <= n - 1 ; k ++ ) { if ( a [ j ] [ k ] > a [ j ] [ k + 1 ] ) { tmp = a [ j - 1 ] [ k ] + a [ j ] [ k ] ; a [ j - 1 ] [ k ] = tmp ; } else { tmp = a [ j - 1 ] [ k ] + a [ j ] [ k + 1 ] ; a [ j - 1 ] [ k ] = tmp ; } } } printf ( "%d\n" , a [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ) ; } }
